fields.description: The unique ID of this Compensation Matrix.
The effective date of this merit increase matrix.  If no date is provided, this will default to 1900-01-01.
The name of this Compensation Matrix. This will be displayed throughout the Workday system.
The description, including purpose and application, of this Compensation Matrix.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
The Data for this compensation matrix, if it is to be based on non-weighted percentages.
The Data for this compensation matrix, if it is to be amount based.
The Data for this compensation matrix, if it is to be based on weighted percentages.
Return the compensation matrix with the name specified by this parameter.
If true, return all Amount based compensation matrices.
If true, return all Non-weighted percent  Based compensation matrices.
If true, return all weighted percent based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_Amount_Based_Data.description: The Data for this compensation matrix, if it is to be amount based.

Compensation_Matrix_Amount_Based_Prompt.description: If true, return all Amount based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_Description.description: The description, including purpose and application, of this Compensation Matrix.

Compensation_Matrix_Matrix_ID.description: The unique ID of this Compensation Matrix.

Compensation_Matrix_Name.description: The name of this Compensation Matrix. This will be displayed throughout the Workday system.

Compensation_Matrix_Non-weighted_Percent.description: The Data for this compensation matrix, if it is to be based on non-weighted percentages.
If true, return all Non-weighted percent  Based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_Weighted_Percent_Bas.description: If true, return all weighted percent based compensation matrices.

Compensation_Matrix_for_Weighted_Percent.description: The Data for this compensation matrix, if it is to be based on weighted percentages.

Effective_Date.description: The effective date of this merit increase matrix.  If no date is provided, this will default to 1900-01-01.

Name_Prompt.description: Return the compensation matrix with the name specified by this parameter.

Rating_Scale_Reference_Rating_Scale_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
